text: the Iraqi army has been driving forward
hard in a major offensive its thrust

fighters used to own these streets now
they belong to the government's forces
is is holding out in some neighborhoods

and all around on this battleground

ruined by the war tens of thousands of

where there's not enough of anything

people and that is posing a major

place just an hour's drive from the

very different
the feeling among these people in the
